title: GRUB - Casual Neighbourhood Bistro Experience
blurb: Hearty and delicious food to be shared with family.
description: GRUB is a casual neighbourhood bistro with a fun vibe and a serious approach to food. It offers a warm and welcoming environment where families and friends can share delicious, hearty meals. The bistro aims to be a happy place, providing simple yet consistent food and friendly service. GRUB is run by Mervyn & Amanda Phan, along with their team, and they take pride in offering a combination of their talents, effort, and hopes to create a welcoming dining experience for everyone. It's a place where you can enjoy familiar, comfortable, and relaxed dining.
datetime_display: friends in a warm and welcoming environment

title: GRUB: A Bistro - Your Happy Place for Families
blurb: Simple yet delicious, always consistent, no surprises.
description: GRUB is a bistro run by Mervyn & Amanda Phan, aiming to be your happy place. It offers a familiar, comfortable, and relaxed atmosphere where you are served by friends. The food is simple yet delicious, always consistent, and without surprises. GRUB is a combination of talents, effort, and hopes, creating a welcoming environment for families and friends to enjoy a meal together. The bistro focuses on providing a dependable spot where everyone can feel at home and enjoy quality time with loved ones over good food. It's a place where memories are made and laughter is shared.
datetime_display: friends, warm and welcoming, crack a joke or two

title: Pasta Kitchen @ Stevens Novotel
blurb: Enjoy delicious pasta at Stevens Novotel location.
description: Pasta Kitchen offers a variety of pasta dishes in a cozy setting. Located at Stevens Novotel, it's a great place for families to enjoy a meal together. The restaurant provides a family-friendly atmosphere with options for both adults and children. Enjoy a range of pasta options, from classic favorites to unique creations. Perfect for a casual family outing or a special occasion. The menu includes options for different dietary needs and preferences. The restaurant is easily accessible and offers a comfortable dining experience for all.

title: GRUB at Bishan Park - Family-Friendly Restaurant
blurb: Dine amidst nature at Bishan Park River Plains.
description: GRUB at Bishan Park River Plains offers a family-friendly dining experience with a diverse menu suitable for all ages. Enjoy a relaxed atmosphere with options for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Perfect for a casual meal with the family, GRUB provides a welcoming environment and tasty food. Located in Bishan Park, it's a great choice for families enjoying the park. With a focus on quality ingredients and friendly service, GRUB ensures a pleasant dining experience for everyone. The menu includes a variety of options to cater to different tastes, ensuring that even the pickiest eaters will find something they enjoy. The restaurant also offers special menus for different times of the day, providing a range of choices for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

title: GRUB Restaurant: A Culinary Experience for Families
blurb: Enjoy delicious meals and a welcoming atmosphere at GRUB.
description: GRUB offers a delightful dining experience for families with a diverse menu featuring burgers, pasta, and local favorites. Our restaurant provides a comfortable and family-friendly environment where everyone can enjoy a satisfying meal. We focus on fresh ingredients and flavorful dishes that cater to both adults and children. Whether you're looking for a casual lunch or a relaxed dinner, GRUB is the perfect spot to create lasting memories with your loved ones. Our menu includes options for various dietary needs and preferences, ensuring a pleasant experience for all.
